cards.title: Rigid Schedules That Don't Fit Your Life
cards.text: For professionals with demanding careers, fixed class times can clash with your work, family, or personal commitments. You deserve a learning solution that adapts to your busy schedule.

cards.title: Courses That Miss the Mark
cards.text: Generic language courses often overlook your unique objectives. Business professionals need industry-specific terminology, while cultural enthusiasts crave a genuine Brazilian experience—not a watered-down version of European Portuguese.

cards.title: Missing the Real Brazilian Vibe
cards.text: Without true cultural context, learning Portuguese feels incomplete. You deserve an immersive experience that infuses Brazilian art, music, and traditions into every lesson.

features.title: Why Choose Sotaque Brasileiro?
features.subtitle: Flexible, Tailored, and Immersive – Classes Designed with Your Goals in Mind
features.description: We believe language learning should fit your life. Whether you're sharpening your business skills or diving into Brazil's vibrant culture, our platform offers flexible scheduling, personalized lessons, and authentic cultural immersion led by native instructors.

cards.title: Learn Anytime, Anywhere
cards.text: No more rigid timetables. Choose the class times that work for you—be it early mornings, late nights, or weekends—so you can progress without compromise.

cards.title: Lessons Tailored to Your Ambitions
cards.text: Our curriculum is crafted to meet your specific needs. For business professionals, we emphasize practical, industry-focused language skills; for cultural enthusiasts, we bring authentic Brazilian expressions and creative insights into every session.

cards.title: Immersive Cultural Experience
cards.text: Experience Brazil like never before. Our classes integrate music, art, and real-life context to create an engaging journey into Brazil's vibrant culture.

cards.title: Native Instructors with Real Insight
cards.text: Learn from certified native Brazilian instructors who bring firsthand cultural knowledge and practical expertise to every lesson, ensuring your learning is both authentic and effective.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything You Need to Know to Get Started

1.question: How flexible are the class schedules?
1.answer: Our classes are designed to fit your busy life. You can choose from morning, evening, or weekend slots and reschedule easily if needed—perfect for professionals and enthusiasts alike!

2.question: Are the classes tailored to my goals?
2.answer: Absolutely. We customize each class to your specific needs. Whether you're learning for business success or cultural immersion, our instructors craft lessons that align with your objectives.

3.question: Do you offer business Portuguese courses?
3.answer: Yes, we offer courses specifically designed for business professionals. Our experienced instructors help you master industry-specific vocabulary and communication skills for your meetings and presentations.

4.question: How do you incorporate Brazilian culture into the classes?
4.answer: We weave authentic Brazilian culture into every lesson—from local expressions and music to art and traditions—ensuring you experience the real Brazil as you learn the language.

5.question: What if I need to cancel or reschedule a class?
5.answer: You can cancel or reschedule a class up to 24 hours before the session. For changes made within 24 hours of the scheduled class, please contact us directly.
